title: Docker in Production: Containers on Kubernetes in the cloud
abstract:
So I developed my application and built a Docker image. Now what ? 
Where and how do I deploy it ? 
How do I make sure it is healthy and always running ? 
How do I get servers to host it ? 
How do I manage those servers ? 

Kubernetes on Azure container services solves this problem and in this session, we will do a deep dive on building micro services, containerising them and deploying them onto Azure container services
